TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IPropertyBag

Docs.summary: Implemented to create a read-only object to contain printer settings for passing to the Import method of a custom data importer.

remarks.para: An implementation of the IPropertyBag interface should expose the following values.

item.description: Returns an unparsed string corresponding to the current page size, such as "A4", "B4", "Letter", and so on.
The size of the top margin.
The size of the bottom margin.
The size of the left margin.
The size of the right margin.
The type of unit used for measuring margins.

remarks.para: Note: These values will not be available if the user has no installed printers.
A custom data importer is created by implementing the interface. For more information about programmatically importing data into an InfoPath form, see the InfoPath Developer Portal

MemberSignature.Value: public void RemoteRead (string pszPropName, out object pVar, Microsoft.Office.Interop.InfoPath.IErrorLog pErrorLog, uint varType, object pUnkObj);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RemoteRead([in]string pszPropName, [out] object& pVar, [in]class Microsoft.Office.Interop.InfoPath.IErrorLog pErrorLog, [in]unsigned int32 varType, [in]object pUnkObj) runtime managed
Public Sub RemoteRead (pszPropName As String, ByRef pVar As Object, pErrorLog As IErrorLog, varType As UInteger, pUnkObj As Object)

public: void RemoteRead(System::String ^ pszPropName, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::Object ^ % pVar, Microsoft::Office::Interop::InfoPath::IErrorLog ^ pErrorLog, System::UInt32 varType, System::Object ^ pUnkObj);
abstract member RemoteRead : string * obj * Microsoft.Office.Interop.InfoPath.IErrorLog * uint32 * obj -> unit

Docs.summary: Used to read printer settings for populating an object in a custom data importer.

remarks.para: A custom data importer is created by implementing the interface. For more information about programmatically importing data into an InfoPath form, see the InfoPath Developer Portal

Public Sub Write (pszPropName As String, ByRef pVar As Object)
public: void Write(System::String ^ pszPropName, System::Object ^ % pVar);
abstract member Write : string * obj -> unit

Docs.summary: Available to the implementation of the interface of a custom data importer, but always returns E_ACCESSDENIED.

remarks.para: A custom data importer is created by implementing the interface. For more information about programmatically importing data into an InfoPath form, see the InfoPath Developer Portal
